message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good next round.
You were generous, I'll be a bit more generous too, but don't push it!
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest I'm willing to go.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll give you a tiny bit more than last time
Okay, Alice, you're tough. This is a compromise. Take it before inflation eats away my share even more.
I can see you're getting desperate, but I'm not backing down. This is my most generous offer yet
